attributes.additional_details: The government need to held accountable and let the people they serve to vote when then feel the need within reason.
attributes.background: To allow the British general public to have a general election before the stated date. Within the next 6 months.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
